Line 4: Line 4:
In April 2011, the company announced the first commodity trade priced in Ven for gold contracts between Europe and South America.<ref>http://www.finextra.com/news/fullstory.aspx?newsitemid=22475|</ref> On [[Earth Day]] 2011, the first carbon credit trade priced in Ven was exchanged between [[Nike]] and Winrock with the London Carbon Market for Brazilian aforestation.<ref>[http://blog.americancarbonregistry.org/redd/american-carbon-registry-offsets-retired-ven-carbon-transaction/ American Carbon Registry Offsets Retired in First Ven Carbon Transaction<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> In May 2011 Ven became the first [[virtual currency]] in history to become linked to inferred in-ground mineral reserves, through a deal announced by [[Hub Culture]] for the acquisition of mineral rights estimated in the multi-million of ounces located in [[Alaska]].{{Citation needed|date=May 2011}}
In April 2011, the company announced the first commodity trade priced in Ven for gold contracts between Europe and South America.<ref>http://www.finextra.com/news/fullstory.aspx?newsitemid=22475|</ref> On [[Earth Day]] 2011, the first carbon credit trade priced in Ven was exchanged between [[Nike]] and Winrock with the London Carbon Market for Brazilian aforestation.<ref>[http://blog.americancarbonregistry.org/redd/american-carbon-registry-offsets-retired-ven-carbon-transaction/ American Carbon Registry Offsets Retired in First Ven Carbon Transaction<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> In May 2011 Ven became the first [[virtual currency]] in history to become linked to inferred in-ground mineral reserves, through a deal announced by [[Hub Culture]] for the acquisition of mineral rights estimated in the multi-million of ounces located in [[Alaska]].{{Citation needed|date=May 2011}}
